title: Why The Conners’ Final Season Revolves Around Roseanne’s Death
description: Roseanne returned in 2018 with an unlikely purpose. Yes, the decision to get the band back together was made in large part to reclaim the series’ legacy and erase its divisive final season (and several other late-in-run storylines) from canon, but the powers that be also had another objective in mind: They were going to […]
author: Ryan Schwartz

title: Casting News: Renée Zellweger Joins OMITB, Southern Charm Exit and More
description: Renée Zellweger is the latest Oscar winner to find Only Murders in the Building. The actress has joined Season 5 of the Hulu comedy in an undisclosed role, the streamer announced on Threads. Zellweger is a two-time Academy Award winner for her roles in Cold Mountain and Judy. Her TV credits include The Thing About […]
author: Vlada Gelman
